_G.AccessorFunc.description: (All) Function: _G.AccessorFunc() Adds simple Get/Set accessor functions on the specified table.

_G.Add_NPC_Class.description: (All) Function: _G.Add_NPC_Class() Defines a global entity class variable with an automatic value in order to prevent collisions with other {{Enum|CLASS}}. You should prefix your variable with CLASS_ for consistency.

_G.AddBackgroundImage.description: (Menu) Function: _G.AddBackgroundImage() Adds the specified image path to the main menu background pool. Image can be png or jpeg.

_G.AddConsoleCommand.description: (All) Function: _G.AddConsoleCommand() {{Internal|Use {{LibraryFunction|concommand|Run}} instead.}}Tells the engine to register a console command. If the command was ran, the engine calls {{LibraryFunction|concommand|Run}}.

_G.AddCSLuaFile.description: (Shared) Function: _G.AddCSLuaFile() Marks a Lua file to be sent to clients when they join the server. Doesn't do anything on the client - this means you can use it in a shared file without problems.

_G.AddonMaterial.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.AddonMaterial() Loads the specified image from the /cache folder, used in combination {{LibraryFunction|steamworks|Download}}.

_G.AddOriginToPVS.description: (Server) Function: _G.AddOriginToPVS() Adds the specified vector to the PVS which is currently building. This allows all objects in visleafs visible from that vector to be drawn.

_G.AddWorldTip.body: AddWorldTip(${1:number entindex=nil}, ${2:string text}, ${3:number dieTime=SysTime() + 0.05}, ${4:Vector pos=ent:GetPos()}, ${5:Entity ent=nil})$0
_G.AddWorldTip.description: (Client) Function: _G.AddWorldTip() This function creates a World Tip, similar to the one shown when aiming at a Thruster where it shows you its force.

_G.AngleRand.description: (All) Function: _G.AngleRand() Returns an angle with a randomized pitch, yaw and roll, first one between -90 and 90, the rest between -180 and 180 degrees.

_G.assert.description: (All) Function: _G.assert() If the result of the first argument is false or nil, an error is thrown with the second argument as the message.

_G.BroadcastLua.description: (Server) Function: _G.BroadcastLua() Sends the specified Lua code to all connected clients and executes it.

_G.BuildNetworkedVarsTable.description: (Shared) Function: _G.BuildNetworkedVarsTable() Dumps the networked variables of all entities into one table and returns it.

_G.CancelLoading.description: (Menu) Function: _G.CancelLoading() Aborts joining of the server you are currently joining.

_G.ChangeBackground.description: (Menu) Function: _G.ChangeBackground() Sets the active main menu background image to a random entry from the background images pool. Images are added with {{GlobalFunction|AddBackgroundImage}}.

_G.ChangeTooltip.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.ChangeTooltip() Automatically called by the engine when a panel is hovered over with the mouse

_G.ClearBackgroundImages.description: (Menu) Function: _G.ClearBackgroundImages() Empties the pool of main menu background images.

_G.ClientsideModel.description: (Client) Function: _G.ClientsideModel() Creates a non physical entity that only exists on the client.

_G.ClientsideRagdoll.description: (Client) Function: _G.ClientsideRagdoll() Creates a fully clientside ragdoll.

_G.ClientsideScene.description: (Client) Function: _G.ClientsideScene() Creates a scene entity based on the scene name and the entity.

_G.CloseDermaMenus.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.CloseDermaMenus() Closes all Derma menus that have been passed to {{GlobalFunction|RegisterDermaMenuForClose}} and calls {{HookFunction|GM|CloseDermaMenus}}

_G.collectgarbage.description: (All) Function: _G.collectgarbage() Executes the specified action on the garbage collector.

_G.ColorAlpha.description: (All) Function: _G.ColorAlpha() Returns a new {{Struct|Color}} with the RGB components of the given {{Struct|Color}} and the alpha value specified.

_G.ColorRand.description: (All) Function: _G.ColorRand() Creates a {{Struct|Color}} with randomized red, green, and blue components. If the alpha argument is true, alpha will also be randomized.

_G.ColorToHSV.description: (All) Function: _G.ColorToHSV() Converts a {{Struct|Color}} into HSV color space.

_G.CompileFile.description: (Shared) Function: _G.CompileFile() Attempts to compile the given file. If successful, returns a function that can be called to perform the actual execution of the script.

_G.CompileString.description: (All) Function: _G.CompileString() This function will compile the code argument as lua code and return a function that will execute that code.

_G.ConsoleAutoComplete.description: (Menu) Function: _G.ConsoleAutoComplete() Returns a table of console command names beginning with the given text.

_G.ConVarExists.description: (All) Function: _G.ConVarExists() Returns whether a ConVar with the given name exists or not

_G.CreateClientConVar.body: CreateClientConVar(${1:string name}, ${2:string default}, ${3:boolean shouldsave=true}, ${4:boolean userdata=false}, ${5:string helptext=""})$0
_G.CreateClientConVar.description: (All) Function: _G.CreateClientConVar() Makes a clientside-only console variable

_G.CreateConVar.description: (All) Function: _G.CreateConVar() Creates a console variable (ConVar), in general these are for things like gamemode/server settings.

_G.CreateMaterial.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.CreateMaterial() Creates a new material with the specified name and shader.

_G.CreateParticleSystem.body: CreateParticleSystem(${1:Entity ent}, ${2:string effect}, ${3:number partAttachment}, ${4:number entAttachment=0}, ${5:Vector offset=Vector( 0, 0, 0 )})$0
_G.CreateParticleSystem.description: (Client) Function: _G.CreateParticleSystem() Creates a new particle system

_G.CreateSound.description: (Shared) Function: _G.CreateSound() Returns a sound parented to the specified entity.

_G.CreateSprite.description: (Client) Function: _G.CreateSprite() Creates and returns a new DSprite element with the supplied material.

_G.CurTime.description: (All) Function: _G.CurTime() Returns the uptime of the server in seconds (to at least 4 decimal places)

_G.DebugInfo.description: (All) Function: _G.DebugInfo() Writes text to the right hand side of the screen, like the old error system. Messages disappear after a couple of seconds.

_G.DeriveGamemode.description: (Shared) Function: _G.DeriveGamemode() Retrieves data from a gamemode to use in yours. This also sets a BaseClass field on your GM table to the gamemode you are deriving from. It appears that this function works by running the init and cl_init Lua files of the target gamemode, then overriding functions that appear in both the target and your gamemode with your gamemode's functions.

_G.Derma_Anim.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.Derma_Anim() Creates a new derma animation.

_G.Derma_DrawBackgroundBlur.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.Derma_DrawBackgroundBlur() Draws background blur around the given panel.

_G.Derma_Hook.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.Derma_Hook() Creates panel method that calls the supplied Derma skin hook via {{LibraryFunction|derma|SkinHook}}

_G.Derma_Install_Convar_Functions.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.Derma_Install_Convar_Functions() Makes the panel (usually an input of sorts) respond to changes in console variables by adding next functions to the panel:

_G.Derma_Message.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.Derma_Message() Creates a derma window to display information

_G.Derma_Query.body: Derma_Query(${1:string text="Message Text (Second Parameter)"}, ${2:string title="Message Title (First Parameter)"}, ${3:string btn1text}, ${4:function btn1func}, ${5:string btn2text}, ${6:function btn2func}, ${7:string btn3text}, ${8:function btn3func}, ${9:string btn4text}, ${10:function btn4func})$0
_G.Derma_Query.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.Derma_Query() Shows a message box in the middle of the screen, with up to 4 buttons they can press.

_G.Derma_StringRequest.body: Derma_StringRequest(${1:string title}, ${2:string subtitle}, ${3:string default}, ${4:function confirm}, ${5:function cancel=nil}, ${6:string confirmText="OK"}, ${7:string cancelText="Cancel"})$0
_G.Derma_StringRequest.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.Derma_StringRequest() Creates a derma window asking players to input a string.

_G.DermaMenu.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.DermaMenu() Creates a DMenu similar to a contextmenu and closes any current menus

_G.DisableClipping.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.DisableClipping() Sets whether rendering should be limited to being inside a panel or not

_G.DOF_Kill.description: (Client) Function: _G.DOF_Kill() Cancels current DOF post-process effect started with {{GlobalFunction|DOF_Start}}

_G.DOF_Start.description: (Client) Function: _G.DOF_Start() Cancels any existing DOF post-process effects.

_G.DOFModeHack.description: (Client) Function: _G.DOFModeHack() A hacky method used to fix some bugs regarding DoF.

_G.DrawBackground.description: (Menu) Function: _G.DrawBackground() {{Internal}} Draws the currently active main menu background image and handles transitioning between background images.

_G.DrawBloom.body: DrawBloom(${1:number Darken}, ${2:number Multiply}, ${3:number SizeX}, ${4:number SizeY}, ${5:number Passes}, ${6:number ColorMultiply}, ${7:number Red}, ${8:number Green}, ${9:number Blue})$0
_G.DrawBloom.description: (Client) Function: _G.DrawBloom() Draws the bloom shader, which creates a glowing effect from bright objects.

_G.DrawColorModify.description: (Client) Function: _G.DrawColorModify() Draws the Color Modify shader, which can be used to adjust colors on screen.

_G.DrawMaterialOverlay.description: (Client) Function: _G.DrawMaterialOverlay() Draws a material overlay on the screen.

_G.DrawMotionBlur.description: (Client) Function: _G.DrawMotionBlur() Creates a motion blur effect by drawing your screen multiple times.

_G.DrawSharpen.description: (Client) Function: _G.DrawSharpen() Draws the sharpen shader, which creates more contrast.

_G.DrawSobel.description: (Client) Function: _G.DrawSobel() Draws the sobel shader, which detects edges and draws a black border.

_G.DrawSunbeams.body: DrawSunbeams(${1:number darken}, ${2:number multiplier}, ${3:number sunSize}, ${4:number sunX}, ${5:number sunY})$0
_G.DrawSunbeams.description: (Client) Function: _G.DrawSunbeams() Renders the post-processing effect of beams of light originating from the map's sun. Utilises the "pp/sunbeams" material

_G.DrawTexturize.description: (Client) Function: _G.DrawTexturize() Draws the texturize shader, which replaces each pixel on your screen with a different part of the texture depending on its brightness. See [[Shaders/g_texturize|g_texturize]] for information on making the texture.

_G.DrawToyTown.description: (Client) Function: _G.DrawToyTown() Draws the toy town shader, which blurs the top and bottom of your screen. This can make very large objects look like toys, hence the name.

_G.DropEntityIfHeld.description: (Shared) Function: _G.DropEntityIfHeld() Drops the specified entity if it is being held by any player with Gravity Gun or +use pickup.

_G.DynamicLight.description: (Client) Function: _G.DynamicLight() Creates or replaces a dynamic light with the given id.

_G.EffectData.description: (Shared) Function: _G.EffectData() Returns a CEffectData}} object to be used with {{LibraryFunction|util|Effect.

_G.Either.description: (All) Function: _G.Either() An 'if then else'. This is ''almost'' equivalent to (''condition'' and ''truevar'' or ''falsevar'') in Lua. The difference is that if ''truevar'' evaluates to false, the plain Lua method stated would return ''falsevar'' regardless of ''condition'' whilst this function would take ''condition'' into account.

_G.EmitSentence.body: EmitSentence(${1:string soundName}, ${2:Vector position}, ${3:number entity}, ${4:number channel=CHAN_AUTO}, ${5:number volume=1}, ${6:number soundLevel=75}, ${7:number soundFlags=0}, ${8:number pitch=100})$0
_G.EmitSentence.description: (Shared) Function: _G.EmitSentence() Plays a sentence from scripts/sentences.txt

_G.EmitSound.body: EmitSound(${1:string soundName}, ${2:Vector position}, ${3:number entity}, ${4:number channel=CHAN_AUTO}, ${5:number volume=1}, ${6:number soundLevel=75}, ${7:number soundFlags=0}, ${8:number pitch=100})$0
_G.EmitSound.description: (Shared) Function: _G.EmitSound() Emits the specified sound at the specified position.

_G.EndTooltip.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.EndTooltip() Removes the currently active tool tip from the screen.

_G.Entity.description: (Shared) Function: _G.Entity() Returns the entity with the matching {{ClassFunction|Entity|EntIndex}}.

_G.Error.description: (All) Function: _G.Error() Throws a Lua error with the specified message and stack level.

_G.error.description: (All) Function: _G.error() Throws a Lua error and breaks out of the current call stack.

_G.ErrorNoHalt.description: (All) Function: _G.ErrorNoHalt() Throws a Lua error but does not break out of the current call stack.

_G.EyeAngles.description: (Client) Function: _G.EyeAngles() Returns the angles of the players view calculated by {{HookFunction|GM|CalcView}}.

_G.EyePos.description: (Client) Function: _G.EyePos() Returns the position of the local player's view point as calculated by {{HookFunction|GM|CalcView}}.

_G.EyeVector.description: (Client) Function: _G.EyeVector() Returns the normal of the players view calculated by {{HookFunction|GM|CalcView}} similar to {{GlobalFunction|EyeAngles}}.

_G.FindMetaTable.description: (All) Function: _G.FindMetaTable() Returns the meta table for the class with the matching name.

_G.FindTooltip.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.FindTooltip() Returns the tool-tip text and tool-tip-panel (if any) of the given panel as well as itself

_G.Format.description: (All) Function: _G.Format() Formats the specified values into the string given. Same as {{LibraryFunction|string|format}}.

_G.FrameNumber.description: (Client) Function: _G.FrameNumber() Returns the number of frames rendered since the game was launched.

_G.FrameTime.description: (All) Function: _G.FrameTime() Returns the {{GlobalFunction|CurTime}}-based time in seconds it took to render the last frame.

_G.GameDetails.body: GameDetails(${1:string servername}, ${2:string serverurl}, ${3:string mapname}, ${4:number maxplayers}, ${5:string steamid}, ${6:string gamemode})$0
_G.GameDetails.description: (Menu) Function: _G.GameDetails() Callback function for when the client has joined a server. This function shows the server's loading URL by default.

_G.gcinfo.description: (All) Function: _G.gcinfo() {{Deprecated|This function was deprecated in Lua 5.1 and is removed in Lua 5.2. Use {{GlobalFunction|collectgarbage}}( "count" ) instead.}} Returns the current floored dynamic memory usage of Lua in kilobytes.

_G.GetConVar.description: (All) Function: _G.GetConVar() Gets the ConVar with the specified name. This function caches the ConVar object internally.

_G.GetConVar_Internal.description: (All) Function: _G.GetConVar_Internal() {{Internal}}Gets the ConVar with the specified name. This function doesn't cache the convar.

_G.GetConVarNumber.description: (All) Function: _G.GetConVarNumber() {{Deprecated|Store the ConVar}} object retrieved with {{GlobalFunction|GetConVar}} and call {{ClassFunction|ConVar|GetInt}} or {{ClassFunction|ConVar|GetFloat}} on it.Gets the numeric value ConVar with the specified name.

_G.GetConVarString.description: (All) Function: _G.GetConVarString() {{Deprecated|Store the ConVar}} object retrieved with {{GlobalFunction|GetConVar}} and call {{ClassFunction|ConVar|GetString}} on it.Gets the string value ConVar with the specified name.

_G.GetDefaultLoadingHTML.description: (Menu) Function: _G.GetDefaultLoadingHTML() Returns the default loading screen URL (asset://garrysmod/html/loading.html)

_G.GetDemoFileDetails.description: (Menu) Function: _G.GetDemoFileDetails() Retrieves data about the demo with the specified filename. Similar to {{GlobalFunction|GetSaveFileDetails}}.

_G.GetDownloadables.description: (Menu) Function: _G.GetDownloadables() Returns a table with the names of files needed from the server you are currently joining.

_G.getfenv.description: (All) Function: _G.getfenv() Returns the environment table of either the stack level or the function specified.

_G.GetGlobalAngle.description: (Shared) Function: _G.GetGlobalAngle() Returns an angle that is shared between the server and all clients.

_G.GetGlobalBool.description: (Shared) Function: _G.GetGlobalBool() Returns a boolean that is shared between the server and all clients.

_G.GetGlobalEntity.description: (Shared) Function: _G.GetGlobalEntity() Returns an entity that is shared between the server and all clients.

_G.GetGlobalFloat.description: (Shared) Function: _G.GetGlobalFloat() Returns a float that is shared between the server and all clients.

_G.GetGlobalInt.description: (Shared) Function: _G.GetGlobalInt() Returns an integer that is shared between the server and all clients.

_G.GetGlobalString.description: (Shared) Function: _G.GetGlobalString() Returns a string that is shared between the server and all clients.

_G.GetGlobalVector.description: (Shared) Function: _G.GetGlobalVector() Returns a vector that is shared between the server and all clients.

_G.GetHostName.description: (Shared) Function: _G.GetHostName() Returns the name of the current server.

_G.GetHUDPanel.description: (Client) Function: _G.GetHUDPanel() Returns the panel that is used as a wrapper for the HUD.

_G.GetLoadPanel.description: (Menu) Function: _G.GetLoadPanel() Returns the loading screen panel and creates it if it doesn't exist.

_G.GetLoadStatus.description: (Menu) Function: _G.GetLoadStatus() Returns the current status of the server join progress.

_G.GetMapList.description: (Menu) Function: _G.GetMapList() Returns a table with the names of all maps and categories that you have on your client.

_G.getmetatable.description: (All) Function: _G.getmetatable() Returns the metatable of an object. This function obeys the metatable's __metatable field, and will return that field if the metatable has it set.

_G.GetOverlayPanel.description: (Menu) Function: _G.GetOverlayPanel() Returns the menu overlay panel, a container for panels like the error panel created in {{HookFunction|GM|OnLuaError}}.

_G.GetRenderTarget.description: (Client) Function: _G.GetRenderTarget() Creates or gets the rendertarget with the given name.

_G.GetRenderTargetEx.body: GetRenderTargetEx(${1:string name}, ${2:number width}, ${3:number height}, ${4:number sizeMode}, ${5:number depthMode}, ${6:number textureFlags}, ${7:number rtFlags}, ${8:number imageFormat})$0
_G.GetRenderTargetEx.description: (Client) Function: _G.GetRenderTargetEx() Creates or gets the rendertarget with the given name, this function allows to adjust the creation of a rendertarget more than {{GlobalFunction|GetRenderTarget}}

_G.GetSaveFileDetails.description: (Menu) Function: _G.GetSaveFileDetails() Retrieves data about the save with the specified filename. Similar to {{GlobalFunction|GetDemoFileDetails}}.

_G.GetViewEntity.description: (Client) Function: _G.GetViewEntity() Returns the entity the client is using to see from (such as the player itself, the camera, or another entity).

_G.HSVToColor.description: (All) Function: _G.HSVToColor() Converts a color from HSV color space into RGB color space and returns a {{Struct|Color}}.

_G.HTTP.description: (All) Function: _G.HTTP() Launches a threaded http request with the given parameters

_G.include.description: (All) Function: _G.include() Executes a Lua script either relative to the current file, or absolute(relative to the /lua/ folder).

_G.IncludeCS.description: (All) Function: _G.IncludeCS() {{Deprecated|To send the target file to the client simply call AddCSLuaFile() in the target file itself.}}

_G.ipairs.description: (All) Function: _G.ipairs() Returns an iterator function for a for loop, to return ordered key-value pairs from a table.

_G.isangle.description: (All) Function: _G.isangle() Returns if the passed object is an Angle.

_G.isbool.description: (All) Function: _G.isbool() Returns if the passed object is a boolean.

_G.IsColor.description: (All) Function: _G.IsColor() Returns whether the given object does or doesn't have a ''metatable'' of a color.

_G.IsEnemyEntityName.description: (All) Function: _G.IsEnemyEntityName() Returns if the given NPC class name is an enemy.

_G.IsEntity.description: (Shared) Function: _G.IsEntity() Returns if the passed object is an Entity}}. Alias of {{GlobalFunction|isentity.

_G.isentity.description: (All) Function: _G.isentity() Returns if the passed object is an Entity.

_G.IsFirstTimePredicted.description: (Shared) Function: _G.IsFirstTimePredicted() Returns if this is the first time this hook was predicted.

_G.IsFriendEntityName.description: (All) Function: _G.IsFriendEntityName() Returns if the given NPC class name is a friend.

_G.isfunction.description: (All) Function: _G.isfunction() Returns if the passed object is a function.

_G.IsInGame.description: (Menu) Function: _G.IsInGame() Returns true if the client is currently playing either a singleplayer or multiplayer game.

_G.ismatrix.description: (All) Function: _G.ismatrix() Returns whether the passed object is a VMatrix.

_G.IsMounted.description: (All) Function: _G.IsMounted() Checks whether or not a game is currently mounted. Uses data given by {{LibraryFunction|engine|GetGames}}. Currently does not work correctly serverside on dedicated servers.

_G.isnumber.description: (All) Function: _G.isnumber() Returns if the passed object is a number.

_G.ispanel.description: (All) Function: _G.ispanel() Returns if the passed object is a Panel.

_G.isstring.description: (All) Function: _G.isstring() Returns if the passed object is a string.

_G.istable.description: (All) Function: _G.istable() Returns if the passed object is a table.

_G.IsTableOfEntitiesValid.description: (All) Function: _G.IsTableOfEntitiesValid() Returns whether or not every element within a table is a valid entity

_G.IsUselessModel.description: (All) Function: _G.IsUselessModel() Returns whether or not a model is useless by checking that the file path is that of a proper model.

_G.IsValid.description:
(All) Function: _G.IsValid() Returns whether an object is valid or not. (Such as Entity}}s, {{Type|Panel}}s, custom {{Type|table objects and more)
Checks that an object is not nil, has an IsValid method and if this method returns true.

_G.isvector.description: (All) Function: _G.isvector() Returns if the passed object is a Vector.

_G.JoinServer.description: (Menu) Function: _G.JoinServer() Joins the server with the specified IP.

_G.JS_Language.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.JS_Language() Adds javascript function 'language.Update' to an HTML panel as a method to call Lua's {{LibraryFunction|language|GetPhrase}} function.

_G.JS_Utility.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.JS_Utility() Adds javascript function 'util.MotionSensorAvailable' to an HTML panel as a method to call Lua's {{LibraryFunction|motionsensor|IsAvailable}} function.

_G.JS_Workshop.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.JS_Workshop() Adds workshop related javascript functions to an HTML panel, used by the "Dupes" and "Saves" tabs in the spawnmenu.

_G.Label.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.Label() Convenience function that creates a DLabel, sets the text, and returns it

_G.LanguageChanged.description: (Menu) Function: _G.LanguageChanged() Callback function for when the client's language changes. Called by the engine.

_G.Lerp.description: (All) Function: _G.Lerp() Performs a linear interpolation from the start number to the end number.

_G.LerpAngle.description: (All) Function: _G.LerpAngle() Returns point between first and second angle using given fraction and linear interpolation

_G.LerpVector.description: (All) Function: _G.LerpVector() Linear interpolation between two vectors. It is commonly used to smooth movement between two vectors.

_G.LoadLastMap.description: (Menu) Function: _G.LoadLastMap() {{Internal}}This function is used to get the last map and category to which the map belongs from the cookie saved with {{GlobalFunction|SaveLastMap}}.

_G.LoadPresets.description: (Client) Function: _G.LoadPresets() Loads all preset settings for the {{Lib|presets}} and returns them in a table

_G.Localize.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.Localize() Returns a localisation for the given token, if none is found it will return the default(second) parameter.

_G.LocalPlayer.description: (Client) Function: _G.LocalPlayer() Returns the player object of the current client.

_G.LocalToWorld.description: (Shared) Function: _G.LocalToWorld() Translates the specified position and angle from the specified coordinate system into worldspace coordinates

_G.Material.description: (All) Function: _G.Material() Either returns the material with the given name, or loads the material interpreting the first argument as the path.

_G.Mesh.description: (Client) Function: _G.Mesh() Returns a new mesh object.

_G.Model.description: (All) Function: _G.Model() Runs {{LibraryFunction|util|PrecacheModel}} and returns the string

_G.module.description: (All) Function: _G.module() Creates a table with the specified module name and sets the function environment for said table.

_G.Msg.description: (All) Function: _G.Msg() Writes every given argument to the console.

_G.MsgAll.description: (Shared) Function: _G.MsgAll() Works exactly like {{GlobalFunction|Msg}} except that, if called on the server, will print to all players consoles plus the server console.

_G.MsgC.description: (All) Function: _G.MsgC() Just like {{GlobalFunction|Msg}}, except it can also print colored text, just like {{LibraryFunction|chat|AddText}}.

_G.MsgN.description: (All) Function: _G.MsgN() Same as {{GlobalFunction|print}}, except it concatinates the arguments without inserting any whitespace in between them.

_G.NamedColor.description: (Client) Function: _G.NamedColor() Returns named color defined in resource/ClientScheme.res.

_G.newproxy.description: (All) Function: _G.newproxy() Returns a new userdata object.

_G.next.description: (All) Function: _G.next() Returns the next key and value pair in a table.

_G.NumDownloadables.description: (Menu) Function: _G.NumDownloadables() Returns the number of files needed from the server you are currently joining.

_G.NumModelSkins.description: (Client) Function: _G.NumModelSkins() Returns the amount of skins the specified model has

_G.OnModelLoaded.body: OnModelLoaded(${1:string modelName}, ${2:number numPostParams}, ${3:number numSeq}, ${4:number numAttachments}, ${5:number numBoneControllers}, ${6:number numSkins}, ${7:number size})$0
_G.OnModelLoaded.description: (Client) Function: _G.OnModelLoaded() {{Internal}} Called by the engine when a model has been loaded. Caches model information with the {{Lib|sql}}.

_G.OpenFolder.description: (Menu) Function: _G.OpenFolder() Opens a folder with the given name in the garrysmod folder using the operating system's file browser. Currently broken on OS X and Linux.

_G.OrderVectors.description: (All) Function: _G.OrderVectors() Modifies the given vectors so that all of vector2's axis are larger than vector1's by switching them around. Also known as ordering vectors.

_G.pairs.description: (All) Function: _G.pairs() Returns an iterator function({{GlobalFunction|next}}) for a for loop that will return the values of the specified table in an arbitrary order.

_G.Particle.description: (All) Function: _G.Particle() Calls {{LibraryFunction|game|AddParticles}} and returns given string.

_G.ParticleEffectAttach.description: (Shared) Function: _G.ParticleEffectAttach() Creates a particle effect with specialized parameters.

_G.Path.description: (Server) Function: _G.Path() Creates a path for the bot to follow

_G.pcall.description: (All) Function: _G.pcall() Calls a function and catches an error that can be thrown while the execution of the call.

_G.Player.description: (Shared) Function: _G.Player() Returns the player with the matching {{ClassFunction|Player|UserID}}.

_G.PositionSpawnIcon.description: (Client) Function: _G.PositionSpawnIcon() Moves the given model to the given position and returns view information based on its properties

_G.PrecacheParticleSystem.description: (Shared) Function: _G.PrecacheParticleSystem() Precaches the particle with the specified name.

_G.PrecacheSentenceFile.description: (Server) Function: _G.PrecacheSentenceFile() Load and precache a custom sentence file.

_G.PrecacheSentenceGroup.description: (Server) Function: _G.PrecacheSentenceGroup() Precache a sentence group in a sentences.txt definition file.

_G.print.description: (All) Function: _G.print() Writes every given argument to the console.

_G.PrintMessage.description: (Server) Function: _G.PrintMessage() Displays a message in the chat, console, or center of screen of every player.

_G.PrintTable.description: (All) Function: _G.PrintTable() Recursively prints the contents of a table to the console.

_G.ProtectedCall.description: (Shared) Function: _G.ProtectedCall() Runs a function without stopping the whole script on error.

_G.RandomPairs.description: (All) Function: _G.RandomPairs() Returns an iterator function that can be used to loop through a table in random order

_G.rawequal.description: (All) Function: _G.rawequal() Compares the two values without calling their __eq operator.

_G.rawget.description: (All) Function: _G.rawget() Gets the value with the specified key from the table without calling the __index method.

_G.rawset.description: (All) Function: _G.rawset() Sets the value with the specified key from the table without calling the __newindex method.

_G.RealFrameTime.description: (Client) Function: _G.RealFrameTime() Returns the real frame-time which is unaffected by host_timescale. To be used for GUI effects (for example)

_G.RealTime.description: (Shared) Function: _G.RealTime() Returns the uptime of the game/server in seconds (to at least 4 decimal places)

_G.RegisterDermaMenuForClose.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.RegisterDermaMenuForClose() Registers a Derma element to be closed the next time {{GlobalFunction|CloseDermaMenus}} is called

_G.RememberCursorPosition.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.RememberCursorPosition() Saves position of your cursor on screen. You can restore it by using {{GlobalFunction|RestoreCursorPosition}}.

_G.RemoveTooltip.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.RemoveTooltip() Does the removing of the tooltip panel. Called by {{GlobalFunction|EndTooltip}}.

_G.RenderAngles.description: (Client) Function: _G.RenderAngles() Returns the angle that the clients view is being rendered at

_G.RenderDoF.body: RenderDoF(${1:Vector origin}, ${2:Angle angle}, ${3:Vector usableFocusPoint}, ${4:number angleSize}, ${5:number radialSteps}, ${6:number passes}, ${7:boolean spin}, ${8:table inView}, ${9:number fov})$0
_G.RenderDoF.description: (Client) Function: _G.RenderDoF() Renders a Depth of Field effect

_G.RenderStereoscopy.description: (Client) Function: _G.RenderStereoscopy() Renders the stereoscopic post-process effect

_G.RenderSuperDoF.description: (Client) Function: _G.RenderSuperDoF() Renders the Super Depth of Field post-process effect

_G.require.description: (All) Function: _G.require() First tries to load a binary module with the given name, if unsuccessful, it tries to load a Lua module with the given name.

_G.RestoreCursorPosition.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.RestoreCursorPosition() Restores position of your cursor on screen. You can save it by using {{GlobalFunction|RememberCursorPosition}}.

_G.RunConsoleCommand.description: (All) Function: _G.RunConsoleCommand() Executes the given console command with the parameters.

_G.RunGameUICommand.description: (Menu) Function: _G.RunGameUICommand() Runs a menu command. Equivalent to {{GlobalFunction|RunConsoleCommand}}( "gamemenucommand", command ) unless the command starts with the "engine" keyword in which case it is equivalent to {{GlobalFunction|RunConsoleCommand}}( command ).

_G.RunString.description: (All) Function: _G.RunString() Evaluates and executes the given code, will throw an error on failure.

_G.SafeRemoveEntity.description: (All) Function: _G.SafeRemoveEntity() Removes the given entity unless it is a player or the world entity

_G.SafeRemoveEntityDelayed.description: (All) Function: _G.SafeRemoveEntityDelayed() Removes entity after delay using {{GlobalFunction|SafeRemoveEntity}}

_G.SavePresets.description: (Client) Function: _G.SavePresets() Overwrites all presets with the supplied table. Used by the {{Lib|presets}} for preset saving

_G.ScreenScale.description: (Client) Function: _G.ScreenScale() Returns a number based on the Size argument and your screen's width. The screen's width is always equal to size 640. This function is primarily used for scaling font sizes.

_G.ScrH.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.ScrH() Returns the height of GMod's window (in pixels).

_G.ScrW.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.ScrW() Gets the width of GMod window (in pixels).

_G.select.description: (All) Function: _G.select() Used to select single values from a vararg or get the count of values in it.

_G.ServerLog.description: (Server) Function: _G.ServerLog() Prints "ServerLog: PARAM" without a newline, to the server log and console.

_G.SetClipboardText.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.SetClipboardText() Adds the given string to the computers clipboard, which can then be pasted in or outside of GMod with Ctrl + V.

_G.setfenv.description: (All) Function: _G.setfenv() Sets the enviroment for a function or a stack level, if a function is passed, the return value will be the function, otherwise nil.

_G.SetGlobalAngle.description: (Shared) Function: _G.SetGlobalAngle() Defines an angle to be automatically networked to clients

_G.SetGlobalBool.description: (Shared) Function: _G.SetGlobalBool() Defined a boolean to be automatically networked to clients

_G.SetGlobalEntity.description: (Shared) Function: _G.SetGlobalEntity() Defines an entity to be automatically networked to clients

_G.SetGlobalFloat.description: (Shared) Function: _G.SetGlobalFloat() Defines a floating point number to be automatically networked to clients

_G.SetGlobalInt.description: (Shared) Function: _G.SetGlobalInt() Sets an integer that is shared between the server and all clients.

_G.SetGlobalString.description: (Shared) Function: _G.SetGlobalString() Defines a string with a maximum of 199 characters to be automatically networked to clients

_G.SetGlobalVector.description: (Shared) Function: _G.SetGlobalVector() Defines a vector to be automatically networked to clients

_G.setmetatable.description: (All) Function: _G.setmetatable() Sets, changes or removes a table's metatable. Returns Tab (the first argument).

_G.SetPhysConstraintSystem.description: (Shared) Function: _G.SetPhysConstraintSystem() Called by the engine to set which constraint system [https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Phys_constraintsystem] the next created constraints should use

_G.SortedPairs.description: (All) Function: _G.SortedPairs() This function can be used in a for loop instead of {{GlobalFunction|pairs}}. It sorts all '''keys''' alphabetically.

_G.SortedPairsByMemberValue.description: (All) Function: _G.SortedPairsByMemberValue() Returns an iterator function that can be used to loop through a table in order of member values, when the values of the table are also tables and contain that member.

_G.SortedPairsByValue.description: (All) Function: _G.SortedPairsByValue() Returns an iterator function that can be used to loop through a table in order of its '''values'''.

_G.Sound.description: (All) Function: _G.Sound() Runs {{LibraryFunction|util|PrecacheSound}} and returns the string

_G.SoundDuration.description: (Shared) Function: _G.SoundDuration() Returns the duration of the sound specified in seconds.

_G.SQLStr.description: (All) Function: _G.SQLStr() Returns the input value in an escaped form so that it can safely be used inside of queries. The returned value is surrounded by quotes unless noQuotes is true. Alias of {{LibraryFunction|sql|SQLStr}}

_G.STNDRD.description: (All) Function: _G.STNDRD() Returns the ordinal suffix of a given number.

_G.SuppressHostEvents.description: (Server) Function: _G.SuppressHostEvents() Suppress any networking from the server to the specified player. This is automatically called by the engine before/after a player fires their weapon, reloads, or causes any other similar shared-predicted event to occur.

_G.SysTime.description: (All) Function: _G.SysTime() Returns a highly accurate time since the start up, ideal for benchmarking.

_G.TextEntryLoseFocus.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.TextEntryLoseFocus() Clears focus from any text entries player may have focused.

_G.TimedCos.description: (All) Function: _G.TimedCos() Returns a cosine value that fluctuates based on the current time

_G.TimedSin.description: (All) Function: _G.TimedSin() Returns a sine value that fluctuates based on {{GlobalFunction|CurTime}}. The value returned will be between the start value plus/minus the range value.

_G.tobool.description: (All) Function: _G.tobool() Attempts to return an appropriate boolean for the given value

_G.ToggleFavourite.description: (Menu) Function: _G.ToggleFavourite() Toggles whether or not the named map is favorited in the new game list.

_G.tonumber.description: (All) Function: _G.tonumber() Attempts to convert the value to a number.

_G.tostring.description: (All) Function: _G.tostring() Attempts to convert the value to a string. If the value is an object and its metatable has defined the __tostring metamethod, this will call that function.

_G.type.description: (All) Function: _G.type() Returns a string representing the name of the type of the passed object.

_G.TypeID.description: (Shared) Function: _G.TypeID() Gets the associated type ID of the variable.

_G.unpack.description: (All) Function: _G.unpack() This function takes a numeric indexed table and return all the members as a vararg. If specified, it will start at the given index and end at end index.

_G.UnPredictedCurTime.description: (All) Function: _G.UnPredictedCurTime() Returns the current asynchronous in-game time.

_G.UpdateLoadPanel.description: (Menu) Function: _G.UpdateLoadPanel() Runs JavaScript on the loading screen panel ({{GlobalFunction|GetLoadPanel}}).

_G.ValidPanel.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.ValidPanel() {{Deprecated|You should use {{GlobalFunction|IsValid}} instead}}

_G.VectorRand.description: (All) Function: _G.VectorRand() Returns a random vector whose components are each between -1 and 1

_G.VGUIFrameTime.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.VGUIFrameTime() Returns the time in seconds it took to render the VGUI.

_G.VGUIRect.description: (Client) Function: _G.VGUIRect() Returns a DShape Derma element with the given dimensions

_G.VisualizeLayout.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.VisualizeLayout() Briefly displays layout details of the given panel on-screen

_G.WorkshopFileBase.description: (Client and Menu) Function: _G.WorkshopFileBase() {{Internal}}Returns a new WorkshopFileBase element

_G.WorldToLocal.description: (Shared) Function: _G.WorldToLocal() Translates the specified position and angle into the specified coordinate system.
